author: malcolm
msg: Make the Contribulyzer treat indented parenthetical asides as asides,
rather than names that should be used to generate contribution details.
(graze): In continuation lines for fields, ensure that lines that
contain whitespace followed by an open parenthesis are not considered
a named continuation for the field.

author: djames
msg: * mucc.py: Add a multiple URL command client written in Python. This mucc clone
is much simpler than the regular version of mucc, because it uses the new
higher-level Python API. (It passes the mucc test suite, too!)

author: djames
msg: Add new functions for handling both relative and absolute URIs,
so as to allow users to specify transaction paths using relative
Txn.upload): Convert supplied paths to relative paths using
(ClientSession.__init__): Initialize anchor URL using new ClientURI class.
(ClientSession.check_path): Convert supplied paths to relative paths
(Repos.check_path): Accept 'encoded' argument for consistency with Client

author: djames
msg: Fix several miscellaneous bugs in the new higher level Python classes
which were detected by the mucc test suite. (I haven't added mucc to
the repository yet, but plan to do so soon, as soon as I've added
(Txn.upload): Don't test for whether non-directories are files. Instead,
treat all non-directories as files, so as to allow users to upload from
(Txn._check_path): Treat newly deleted files as missing.
(Client._abs_copyfrom_path): Encode paths in absolute copyfrom URIs.
